STUDENT_TESTIMONIALS.TITLE: What Our Students Say
STUDENT_TESTIMONIALS.DESCRIPTION: Hear from Syrian students about their experiences with the union and how it has helped them in their academic journey.
STUDENT_TESTIMONIALS.TESTIMONIAL: As a new student in Turkey, the orientation events organized by the union helped me understand university procedures and adapt to campus life quickly. I'm grateful for their support!

ABOUT_SECTION.TITLE: About Us
ABOUT_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: Learn about the Syrian Students Union at Karabuk University, our mission, vision, history, and the team supporting Syrian students.
ABOUT_SECTION.VISION_DESCRIPTION_1: We envision a community where every Syrian student at Karabuk University has access to the support, resources, and opportunities needed to succeed academically, professionally, and personally.
ABOUT_SECTION.VISION_DESCRIPTION_2: We aim to be a bridge between Syrian students and the broader university community, fostering cultural understanding and building lasting relationships.
ABOUT_SECTION.MISSION_DESCRIPTION_1: The Syrian Students Union at Karabuk University is committed to supporting Syrian students throughout their academic journey. We strive to create a welcoming community that promotes academic excellence, personal growth, and cultural exchange.
ABOUT_SECTION.MISSION_DESCRIPTION_2: Our mission is to provide resources, organize activities, and facilitate connections to help Syrian students succeed in their studies and adapt to university life in Turkey.
ABOUT_SECTION.HISTORY_DESCRIPTION_1: Founded in 2020 by a small group of dedicated Syrian students who recognized the need for a support system for their peers.
ABOUT_SECTION.HISTORY_DESCRIPTION_2: Initial informal meetings to assist new students in adapting to university life quickly evolved into an organized union with a clear mission to support the growing Syrian student community at the university.
ABOUT_SECTION.HISTORY_DESCRIPTION_3: Over the years, we have expanded our activities to include orientation events, academic workshops, cultural celebrations, and professional development opportunities. Today, we proudly serve hundreds of Syrian students, aiding them in their educational journey in Turkey.
